article.headline: Baylor 82, MVSU 50
article.story: WACO, Texas (AP) -- Kevin Rogers had 26 points and 10 rebounds, with a pair of dunks in Baylor's game-turning run, and the Bears beat Mississippi Valley State 82-50 on Monday night. The Bears (6-1) finally put the game out of reach with a 14-0 run over a 4 1/2-minute span early in the second half. Rogers' dunks sandwiched a 3-pointer by Tweety Carter at the end of the spurt that put Baylor up 45-30 with 15:15 left. Mississippi Valley State (0-8), which led briefly before halftime, had four turnovers and three missed shots during Baylor's run after Stanford Speech's 3-pointer got Valley within 31-30 in the opening minute of the second half. The Delta Devils never got closer than 13 points after that, and trailed by as many as 34. Rogers made 12-of-15 shots. Carter had 17 points with four 3-pointers, while Aaron Bruce had 14 points and Henry Dugat 10. Eric Petty had 14 points for Valley and Carl Lucas added 12. Carl Lucas' 3-pointer with 5 minutes left in the first half put Valley up 20-19. The two teams then traded baskets, but Baylor then surged ahead to stay with seven straight points. Baylor, coming off a 67-64 loss to No. 8 Washington State in which it blew a 14-point lead in the second half, is 27-0 against Southwestern Athletic Conference teams. The Delta Devils lost 71-26 at Washington State last month.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
